snippet: There’s growing evidence that donations to judicial campaigns may be influencing rulings.
abstract: Editorial warns there is growing evidence that donations to judicial election campaigns may be influencing rulings; contends that judicial branch must be insulated as much as possible from normal political pressures if it is to be meaningful check on other branches of government.
lead_paragraph: There’s growing evidence that donations to judicial campaigns may be influencing rulings.

headline.main: Money and Judges, a Bad Mix
headline.print_headline: Money and Judges, a Bad Mix

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
